```{r}

library(ggplot2)

source("Mpox_simulation_N_times.R")

# Run the simulation 1000 times
set.seed(12)
results <- simulate_n_times(1000)


summary(results)

# Plot the histogram of QoL reduction
ggplot(results, aes(x = overall_qol_reduction)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "blue", color = "black", alpha = 0.7) +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Overall QoL Reduction Due to Mpox",
       x = "Overall QoL Reduction",
       y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal()

# Summary of deaths
cat("Summary of total deaths over 1000 simulations:\n")
print(summary(results$total_deaths))

```
